mapper.select: SELECT * FROM member WHERE member_id = UPPER(#{memberId})
mapper.insert: insert into member( member_uid, dept_code, job_code, company_code, member_id, password, member_name, address, tel, member_image, member_role ) values ( UPPER(#{companyCode}) || '.' || #{memberId}, #{deptCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jobCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPPER(#{companyCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}), #{memberId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tel, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberImage, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberRole, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: SELECT m.member_uid, m.dept_code, d.dept_name, m.job_code, j.job_name, m.company_code, c.company_name, m.member_id, m.member_name, m.address, m.tel, m.member_image, m.member_role FROM member m INNER JOIN department d ON m.dept_code = d.dept_code INNER JOIN job j ON m.job_code = j.job_code INNER JOIN company c ON m.company_code = c.company_code WHERE m.company_code = UPPER(#{companyCode}) ORDER BY m.job_code
